game.name: Gun Of Fate: The Silver Gun Of Ylia
game.shortDescription: A shooting adventure RPG game, where you play as a gunslinger in Westland. The main combat system of the game is gun shooting. You can complete quest and side missions, unlock items and equipment, and also play fishing and horse racing mini games.
